titleStmt.title: A most famous victory obtained by that vallant religious gentleman Collonell Venne against Prince Robert, who came against Windsor on Munday the 7th of November promising Collonell Venn great preferment if that he wou'd deliver up the said castle to His Majesties use : also Collonell Vens answer to Prince Roberts propositions : likewise declaring how the said towne is beat downe, and men, women, and children forced to fly into the woods to save themselves from the cruelty of the Cavaliers.

A most famous victory obtained by that vallant religious gentleman Collonell Venne against Prince Robert, who came against Windsor on Munday the 7th of November promising Collonell Venn great preferment if that he wou'd deliver up the said castle to His Majesties use : also Collonell Vens answer to Prince Roberts propositions : likewise declaring how the said towne is beat downe, and men, women, and children forced to fly into the woods to save themselves from the cruelty of the Cavaliers.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
